components.description: A whole, bright orange carrot, topped with long green leaves, as if freshly plucked from the garden. Some platforms feature a longer, thinner carrot, others a shorter, more bulbous one.
components.title: Carrot

description: A whole, bright orange carrot, topped with long green leaves, as if freshly plucked from the garden. Some platforms feature a longer, thinner carrot, others a shorter, more bulbous one.
title: Carrot

version.description:
The Unicode Consortium accepted the following emoji 72 emojis for Unicode 9.0. This update was released on June 21, 2016. Most vendors added support for this update within the 2016 calendar year. Sample images and more about Unicode 9.0.

Emoji 4.0 was published in late 2016, which added additional emoji professions.

New in Unicode 9

emoji_net_data.category: Supplemental Symbols And Pictographs -> Food symbol
emoji_net_data.definition: An orange carrot, shown raw with green leaves attached. Carrot was approved as part of Unicode 9.0 in 2016 and added to Emoji 3.0 in 2016. C http://emojipedia.org/carrot/
emoji_net_data.name: carrot

bn:00016271n: A yellow-orange, longish-rounded root vegetable, which is eaten raw or boiled.
Perennial plant widely cultivated as an annual in many varieties for its long conical orange edible roots; temperate and tropical regions
Root vegetable, usually orange in colour
The carrot is a root vegetable, usually orange in color, though purple, red, white, and yellow varieties exist.
A vegetable with a nutritious, juicy, orange, sweet root, Daucus carota in the family Apiaceae.

bn:00079663n: In culinary terms, a vegetable is an edible plant or its part, intended for cooking or eating raw.
A plant raised for some edible part of it.
Edible seeds or roots or stems or leaves or bulbs or tubers or nonsweet fruits of any of numerous herbaceous plant
Edible plant or part of a plant
A nutritional and culinary term that denotes any part of a plant that is commonly consumed by humans as food.
Any of various herbaceous plants having parts that are used as food.
The edible part of such a plant.

bn:00035650n: Any substance consumed to provide nutritional support for the body. For prepared ready-to-eat food, use dish: Q746549.
Any substance consumed by living organisms to sustain life.
Any substance that can be consumed by living organisms, especially by eating, in order to sustain life.
Any solid substance (as opposed to liquid) that is used as a source of nourishment
Food is any substance consumed to provide nutritional support for the body.
